title: Das Green Old Deal
description: We team up with Vox's The Impact, to tell the story of how one man changed the way Germany – and arguably the world – uses energy. | Subscribe to our weekly newsletter here.
copyright: Copyright 2015-2021 NPR - For Personal Use Only
itunes:title: Das Green Old Deal
itunes:author: NPR
itunes:summary: On today's show, we head to Germany to meet the person who kickstarted the green energy market and learn about the wonky policy tool that helped him do it.
itunes:subtitle: On today's show, we head to Germany to meet the person who kickstarted the green energy market and learn about the wonky policy tool that helped him do it.
